description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

description.en: When a police officer is posted to a remote village in the countryside, little does he realize he's encroaching on a community of cannibals…
description.ru:
Полицейский Дайго Агава вместе с семьёй переезжает в горную деревушку под названием Цветочная. Жители деревни горячо принимают семью Дайго.
Однажды в лесу находят труп старушки. После этого происшествия Дайго постепенно начинает осознавать все происходящие вокруг странности и приходит к мысли, что в этой деревне едят людей. Начинают происходить очень странные инциденты, атмосфера отчуждения наполняет деревню. Сможет ли обычный полицейский разгадать все ужасные тайны, которая таит в себе эта деревня и, что важнее, сможет ли он остаться в живых?

description.en:
“Hey, don’t get confused. I’ve never thought of you as my little brother. You don’t even know your right place.”   
That was the dagger that hurt the most.  
Han Myoung Woo.  
A child of a wealthy family with a quick mind.  
But god didn’t give him everything.  
A near incurable genetic heart disease  
He did his best in order to earn the respect of the people around him.  
But his father, the chairman, and his family members never took him seriously.  
  
That was when an accident suddenly struck him.  
And…  
He woke up in the body of the severely injured student, Kim Cheol Min.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%92%A4%EB%81%9D%EC%9E%91%EB%A0%AC/2666)
description.ko:
“야, 착각하지마. 난 한번도 널 동생으로 생각한 적 없어. 주제를 모르고”
가슴을 파고드는 비수였다. 
한명우.
명석한 두뇌와 재벌가의 자식이었다.
다만 하늘은 모든 걸 주지않았다.
불치병 수준인 선천적 심장병.
이를 악물고 인정받기 위해 최선 또 최선을 다했다. 
그러나 아버지인 회장을 비롯해 식구 그 누구도 진심으로 대하지 않았다. 

그러던 그가 급작스런 사고를 당했다.
그리고......
치명적인 부상을 당한 대학생 김철민의 몸으로 들어갔다.
 
건강하다.
아니 건강하다못해 넘친다.
잘돌아가는 머리에 체력까지.......

이제 두 마리 토끼를 잡으러 간다.
꼭 두 마리 토끼여야 했다.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%92%A4%EB%81%9D%EC%9E%91%EB%A0%AC/2666)
description.ru:
«Эй, не ошибайся. Я никогда не думал о тебе как о своем младшем брате. Ты даже не знаешь свое место ". Это был самый болезненный удар. Хан Мён У - ребёнок из обеспеченной семьи, обладающий хорошим умом. Но не во всём ему повезло в жизни. У него почти неизлечимая генетическая болезнь сердца. Он приложил все усилия, чтобы заслужить уважение окружающих. Но его отец, председатель и члены его семьи никогда не воспринимали его всерьез. Именно тогда с ним внезапно случился несчастный случай. И... Он проснулся в теле тяжело раненого ученика Ким Чхол Мина.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%92%A4%EB%81%9D%EC%9E%91%EB%A0%AC/2666)

altTitles.ja-ro: 人間やめたい米沢さん

description.en: Haru Yonezawa is an outstanding office manager who is looked up to by all his teammates. On the surface, he is cool and collected, never getting his feathers ruffled by his grouchy boss. But the truth is he has a secret hobby that, if anyone found out about would destroy his elite image. Every night, after a long, stressful day at work, he unwinds by dressing up and roleplaying... as a dog. Looking for a new master to help meet his needs, he calls upon a call girl, who shows up and is none other than one of his subordinates from work!

It's the start of a new school year. The new homeroom teacher for Abikura-kun, a second-year high school boy, is Hiyori Hiwamura, who is known as a "Scary Teacher", rumored to curse you if she gets offended! One day after school, Abikura-kun witnessed the other side of "YowaYowa-sensei"... and he is shocked by the gap between reputation and reality! The opening of a romantic comedy that will stir up your protective instincts!!
description.ja: 新学期。2年生に進級した男子高校生・阿比倉くん達のクラス担任になったのは、機嫌を損ねれば呪われると噂の通称『こわこわ先生』こと、鶸村ひより先生だった！ そんな、『こわこわ先生』の裏の一面を、ある日の放課後、目撃してしまった阿比倉くんは……。まさかのギャップに悶絶必至！ あなたの庇護欲を掻き立てる、よわよわラブコメ開幕!!

title.en: Fist of the North Star - Strawberry Flavor

altTitles.ja: 北斗の拳 イチゴ味

description.en:
In this *very* zany take on the dramatic series by Buronson and Tetsuo Hara, the end of the century… wasn't so bad, actually. A *very* special and brave Holy Emperor, Souther, wants to become more "involved" and to be on "friendly terms" with the noble Kenshiro & his posse. *Especially* Kenshiro. Due to his very outgoing nature, he also crashes the homes of his other buddies, often when they *especially* don't want him to show up!  
  
Join Souther as he releases his feelings in heart-throbbing, mind-bending confessions, settles complex and engrossing territorial disputes with deep and intricate consequences, enjoys the simple and introspective pleasures of a quiet dinner, and climbs the top of the rough and brutal pyramid that is the idol world - with the help of his best buddies, of course! Maybe even Kenshiro will be there - who knows!  
  
By the time it got its anime in 2015, *Strawberry Flavor* had sold over 1 million copies in Japan. The anime was composed of 2-minute long, abridged adaptations of select chapters from the first three volumes. They were placed after the main episodes of *DD Fist of the North Star* season 2.  
  
Every volume also contains at least one *gaiden* (side story). These gaiden are drawn in Yukito's (the elder sister of Yukito Imouto) normal artstyle, and expand on characters who did not receive gaiden during the Hokuto Gaiden period in the late 2000's.  
  
Gaiden List:  
Volume 1: Spade, Club & Diamond, Heart  
Volume 2: Souther  
Volume 3: Shuren & Huey  
Volume 4: Fudo  
Volume 5: Yuda  
Volume 6: Shin  
Volume 7: Falco & friends, Ein  
Volume 8: Ogai  
Volume 9: Devil Rebirth

There are many strange things in old stories that still roam this land. It is said that people who were possessed by strange things visited the magical fox monster at the traditional store Banwoldang and asked for help. Strange stories told by Yu-dan, a high school student who sees ghosts, Baek-ran, the fox who rules Imae Mangyang, and the monster clerks of Banwoldang.

title.en: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu - Twitter comics by Fountain's Square (Doujinshi)

description.en: A collection of Twitter fan comics about Ichikawa and Yamada (from [Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu](https://mangadex.org/title/23811)) by Fountains Square.

altTitles.ja: 犬飼さん家の押しかけJK

description.en: One day, the thirty-something salaryman Inukai met a high school girl Komugi who claimed to be the reincarnation of his childhood dog. Now she comes over every day looking to play with her owner, but her pet antics don't seem so innocent in human form! A semi-cohabitation comedy between a dog-girl and a single office worker!

[I just need one video of Jung Dawon, that fucking bastard who often calls me over to his place just because he's bored, and I'm out of this company.] 

Choi Jihoo, who works as Jung Dawon's secretary, the Representative of the Seungjin C&T Corporation, has a secret. He has received a dangerous offer - if he hands over a video that disinherits Jung Dawon from the company management, he will receive an incredibly large amount of money. 

One day, as Jihoo is making backups of his videos while dreaming of making a fortune, Dawon finds out. 
"There is certainly quite a lot of shocking content in here. Why did you film these videos?"
And then, the man says something completely inconceivable -
"Secretary Choi, are you in love with me?"
"Yes, yes, you're right! It's all because I love you, Pre-- huh?!?!"

Zhào Shì meets Luó Lìlì, a devlilish girl at his university entrance ceremony. Luó Lìlì is a Bilibili livestreamer. Zhào Shì now has to deal with his senior who teases him with broadcasts everyday.  
TN: Xuejie is a chinese term to refer to seniors or older females either in a workplace or at school, similar to the japanese word "senpai"(expect for like females)

On one ordinary night, a relationship between the two began without much thought. For Hoyeon, that's just how it was with Soobin. Despite this, as they spent more time together, he found himself growing more sincere in their relationship. But then, Soobin said to him:

"Hyung, let's break up."

"Alright, do what you want. No plans on giving me a reason this time, either?"

This was Soobin's 7th time breaking up with him without a reason. Every other time they had met up again within a week, so Hoyeon didn't expect any different this time... But it's been two weeks and Soobin still hasn't called!! Something felt wrong.

Looking back, Hoyeon's biggest mistake was that he didn't ask the reason why they had broken up the first time.

After failing the auditions for a role he'd been preparing for, Lyle takes a trip to Korea for a change of pace. As a black-footed cat-man, he was not able to present himself as a top amongst the larger beastmen, but having travelled to this place with all sorts of small and cute animals that suited his tastes, he thinks he could be a top here. After downloading an online dating app, Lyle starts chatting with a rabbit-man with the handle 'Kkyu', and steadily grows fond of him. Finally, the day they meet arrives! However, what appears before Lyle, as his heart pounds, is... a brute-like rabbit...?!
"Is this person... really my Kkyu...?!"
description.fr: Lyle, un chat sauvage qui se sent inférieur aux autres prédateurs, est venu en Corée après avoir échoué à une audition pour un rôle qu'il préparait. Bien qu'il soit en concurrence avec d'autres mâles, il est heureux de découvrir qu'il y a plein d'animaux adorables et mignons qui correspondent à ses goûts. Lyle fait ensuite la rencontre de "Kkyu" sur une application de rencontres, qu'il finit par commencer à apprécier. Le jour de leur rencontre arrive enfin ! Mais Lyle découvre que la personne avec qu'il parlait est en fait... un lapin grincheux ?! "C'est vraiment... mon Kkyu ??!"

description.en:
As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
description.ru: Эта история случилась в начале XI века, когда викинги, безраздельно господствовавшие в северных морях, грабили побережья Франции и Англии. В эпоху, где оружие значило больше, нежели слова, маленький мальчик невольно оказывается косвенной причиной гибели своего отца. Повзрослев и став на путь воина, он жаждет честного поединка с убийцей отца – легендарным главарём отряда викингов-наемников, но возраст и отсутствие опыта не позволяют ему сделать это. Чтобы не упускать своего врага из виду, юноша вступает в его отряд и в награду за выполнение тяжелого боевого задания требует поединка с ним, но терпит поражение. Юноша продолжает прилагать все усилия, чтобы осуществить свою месть. Внезапно он оказывается вовлечён в куда более кровавое столкновение…
description.tr: Çocukken Thorfinn, büyük Leif Ericson'un ayaklarının dibinde oturur ve batıdaki uzak diyarların vahşi masallarıyla heyecanlanırdı. Ama gençlik hayalleri bir paralı asker baskınıyla paramparça oldu. Ailesini öldüren Vikingler tarafından yetiştirilen Thorfinn, grubun lideri Askeladd'ı öldürmek ve babasının intikamını almak isteyen korkunç bir savaşçı oldu. Thorfinn'i çileli yaşamı boyunca ayakta tutan, ailesiyle olan gururu ve batıdaki bereketli topraklara, savaşın ve köleliğin olmadığı bir ülkeye, Leif'in Vinland adını verdiği topraklara dair hayalleridir.
description.pt-br: Thorfinn é filho de Thors, um lendário guerreiro viking, mas que após anos no campo de batalha, descobre uma coisa mais maravilhosa que matar seus iguais. Viver sua própria vida, em paz. Mas os ventos lhe trazem uma notícia que atrapalhará seus dias de paz, e Thorfinn, seu filho, pouco sabe desta vida passada de guerra de seu pai. Após descobrir o passado de seu pai, Thorfinn se revolta contra ele, e sai para a guerra junto de seu pai, mas quando reconhece o verdadeiro valor dele, já é tarde demais. Agora Thorfinn deverá seguir sua própria vida, seguindo valores que seu pai lhe ensinou, mas sem perder sua coragem. Este é só o começo desta grande saga de Thorfinn que acompanha os Vikings no século XI!

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

Jace, an Academic Honours student, once had a very bright future! However, his life has gone downhill ever since he punched a noble classmate. When he finally manages to get a chance to work as a private tutor… The duke is so handsome that he cannot concentrate!

title.en: The Return of the Disaster-Class Hero

description.en:
Twenty years.

For twenty long years, the thirteenth saint Lee Geon was trapped inside the Tower of Demons after being backstabbed by twelve of his allies. These twelve "saints" were warriors chosen by the twelve Zodiac gods to defeat mysterious monsters called "calamities" that were massacring the planet. Though no god had chosen Geon as a saint, he became the mightiest of them all, which made him a hero... and a target.

But now, Geon has brawled his way out of the tower, and he's back stronger than ever. All that's left is to exact brutal payback on each of the saints, but none of these powerful beings will go down without a fight.

Will Geon be able to stay in one piece while achieving the divine revenge of his dreams?

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sy4PeK3mCrI)
description.fr:
Il était une fois un héros qui considéré autre fois comme le plus puissant de la Terre.

« Mais il est mort… Comment une personne désignée comme morte pourrait-il revenir ? »
« Ouais, j’aimerais bien voir ça, moi aussi. »

Mais 20 années plus tard, il revint.

« Pourquoi êtes-vous aussi choqués, les gars ? À voir vos gueules, on pourrait croire que vous vous sentez coupable ? »

‘Ces enfoirés… je vais pas les laisser s’en tirer comme ça…’
description.ko:
지상에 최강의 영웅이 있었다.

“하지만 죽었잖아. 우리가 죽인 놈이 어떻게 돌아와?”
“그러게. 돌아올 수 있으면 한번 돌아와 보라지.”

그런데 20년 만에 진짜 돌아와 버렸다?

“뭘 그리 놀래? 왜. 양심에 찔릴 짓이라도 하셨나?”

이 XX들. 가만 안 둔다.

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sy4PeK3mCrI)
description.pt-br:
Eu era o maior herói da Terra.

“Mas ele está morto. Como aquele cara que matamos está de volta?”

“Não sei.”

Eu realmente voltei depois de 20 anos?

“Por que estão tão surpresos? Fizeram algo para ficar com a consciência pesada?”

Seus desgraçados. Vocês não perdem por esperar.

description.en:
Tatsuya Uesugi, the older brother who has no relationship with the word "hard work," and Kazuya Uesugi, the younger brother who tries his hardest in everything he does. 

They are twin brothers. They have known Minami Asakura, the only daughter of the neighboring coffee shop "Minamikaze" since childhood. You can't take your eyes off the "youth" of these three...!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2008)

---
- **Won the 28th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen**

altTitles.vi: Trầm Cảm Vì Nam Sinh Trung Học

description.en:
1-3. Danshi Koukousei ni Yuuutsu
4. Sotsugyousei no Yuuutsu
5. Toshishita Kareshi no Omowaku
6-7. Suiyoubi no Chronostasis
8. Zaizen-kun no Mendokusagari
description.vi:
Thầy giáo Kirino Yusuke mới nhận lớp, luôn nhận thấy một ánh mắt dõi theo mãnh liệt của cậu học trò Saotome Hayato – năm 2 khối 4 lớp 13. Anh nghĩ cậu thích mình và không tự chủ được cũng để ý đến cậu, thầy giáo hoang mang lo lắng vì có lẽ mình gay rồi?? Tuy nhiên sẽ ra sao nếu tất cả chỉ là một hiểu lầm!? Một câu chuyện tình yêu với những rung động nhẹ nhàng, lãng mạn và có chút hài hước được mở ra từ đây!

Lưu ý: RedFrogTeam chỉ dịch couple đầu từ C1 đến C4.5

description.en:
Before she died, Taga Reiji's mother made arrangements to ensure her son would not be alone. What Taga did not know about these "arrangements" was that he would be enrolled in a special class at the school his mother founded where prospective fiance candidates would all vie for his hand in marriage. How will Taga's new life of constantly being surrounded by girls unfold and will he be able to choose just one?  
  
From the genius behind the totally not axed Kimiiro Focus comes a new revolutionary harem romcom!

In order to trace the culprit behind his family’s murder in his childhood, Vampire Hunter Heilo accepts a kill order from a client. 

His target is the head of the Livera Group, Herrace. Heilo joins Herrace’s company, and successfully acquires a position as the personal secretary of Herrace himself, who is known for his dominating presence in politics and the underworld. 

However, Herrace’s special treatment gradually causes Heilo’s heart to sway… 

What will his fate be, having fallen for the man he's supposed to kill?!
description.fr:
Le chasseur de vampires Heilo effectue une mission d'assassinat pour un client afin de trouver des indices qui pourraient le conduire à la personne qui a assassiné sa famille lorsqu'il était enfant. La cible à laquelle Heilo doit faire face est le chef du groupe Rivera, Hereis. Pendant son infiltration, Heilo a rejoint la société d'Hereis, connue pour être un gros bonnet dans le monde politique et ses coulisses. Il réussit ensuite à devenir son secrétaire exécutif. Cependant, le traitement spécial d'Hereis ne cesse d'ébranler les convictions d'Heilo...

Quel sera le destin d'Heilo s'il tombe amoureux d'un homme qu'il doit tuer !

En co-prod avec la Boulangerie

description.en:
Gong Chanhyeok, an author of NSFW BL web novels, receives a proposal to adapt his work into a drama. 
Usually averse to his web novels being adapted, Chanhyeok reluctantly agrees to attend a meeting. He  makes his way there and ultimately meets Lee Hyeoksu, a top star who will be the lead in the drama. 

Chanhyeok is a diehard fan of Hyeoksu. Upon seeing the subject of his masturbatory fantasies appear right in front of him, Chanhyeok is so stunned that he unwittingly agrees to Hyeoksu's request to hang out at his place. It was right there that his NSFW fanfics centered around Hyeoksu were discovered...

However, Hyeoksu brings up an unexpected offer. 
"Shall we try this?"

The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

description.en: Thirty years ago, the young Peiking Opera performer Yen Tieh-hua was wrongly convicted of the murder of her own family and sent to prison. Twenty years later she died while still incarcerated. Yet, today, this same woman has mysteriously returned as a superpowered teen in Peiking Opera costume, determined to avenge the massacre of her family.

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en:
It was the day Chiichan, who never comes to middle school at all, suddenly showed up in her tattered sweats with dead insects, causing a commotion in the class. Yuua has been with her since kindergarten and cares about her, and her classmate Koudai asks if he can help Chiichan out...
A new series born from a unique collaboration, in which Oshimi Shuuzou depicts the prequel to Chiichan, the aberrant heroine of Naitou Eisuke's film *Poison Girl*, as an original manga *Chiichan*!
description.fr: Chii, qui ne vient habituellement pas en cours, se présente un jour vétue de haillons, et un insecte à la main. De quoi faire parler la classe...
description.es-la: Chii-chan, quien rara vez asiste a la escuela secundaria, que viste un desgastado chándal y tiene un hobby peculiar. Un día hace algo que causa miedo en el salón, por lo que, dos jóvenes tratan de ayudarla. Esta nueva serie es una colaboración en la que Shūzō Oshimi dibuja la precuela del extraordinario personaje de Chii-chan, la inusual personaje de la película "Doku Musume" dirigida por Eirō Naitō.

description.en:
Jasperia, Republic of Domus. After many years of conflict between two groups of settlers, a precarious balance appears to have been established, although the self-proclaimed authoritarian occupation government does not have unanimous support. To avoid being mistaken for suspected terrorists, pregnant women must wear an identification sign. In fact, several years ago, a scientist developed a "technology" that allowed women who had been implanted with an alien embryo to teleport. But now the government claims that these women, the "Wombs", are terrorists... What is really happening? Almare is one of them. A soldier turned resistance fighter, she seems willing to do anything to defend her rights and those of her people.
Prepublished in Japan by Futabasha, this two-volume series takes place years before the events of Wombs and is an excellent gateway into this rich world. Between terrorism, political manipulations and territorial wars, Yumiko Shirai once again immerses us in his fascinating universe... This title can be read perfectly independently of the main series.
description.es:
Jasperia, República de Domus. Tras muchos años de conflicto entre dos grupos de colonos, parece haberse establecido un precario equilibrio, aunque el autoproclamado gobierno autoritario de ocupación no cuenta con un apoyo unánime. Para evitar ser confundidas con presuntas terroristas, las mujeres embarazadas deben llevar un signo de identificación. De hecho, hace varios años, un científico desarrolló una "tecnología" que permitía teletransportarse a las mujeres a las que se había implantado un embrión alienígena. Pero ahora el gobierno afirma que estas mujeres, las "Wombs", son terroristas... ¿Qué está pasando realmente? Almare es una de ellas. Militar convertida en luchadora de la resistencia, parece dispuesta a todo para defender sus derechos y los de su pueblo.
Prepublicada en Japón por Futabasha, esta serie de dos volúmenes tiene lugar años antes de los acontecimientos de Wombs y constituye una excelente puerta de entrada a este rico mundo. Entre terrorismo, manipulaciones políticas y guerras territoriales, Yumiko Shirai vuelve a sumergirnos en su fascinante universo... Este título puede leerse perfectamente con independencia de la serie principal.

description.en: One day, Kaoru Uno suddenly starts seeing mysterious monsters known as shiryo or death spirits. With the arrival of his late father's coworker Yoji Amane and a special ring his father gave him, Kaoru is ushered into the world of necromancers! From the creator of Aliens Area comes a fantastic new series of necromancer battles!

The protagonist, Kodama Hoshinagi, a first-year high school student, is constantly pressured by Wataya Senpai, a natural and charming senior. In the past, she had a one-sided love for him, but tried to keep her feelings to herself in order not to be bothered. However, despite knowing that it would hurt her, her feelings for Senpai grew out of sheer force majeure. 

(natalie.mu)

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore to mou Ichido First Love.

description.en:
I fell in love with fate. But the memory of that love disappeared. Four men were waiting for her when she lost her memory. It seems that just before she lost her memory, she chose one of these men as her fiancé. She had even decided to get engaged, but now she has to redo her first love. You might already be in a trap!

All of them are seriously trying to get married, and the exciting reverse love story is about to begin!

title.en: Salaryman Exorcist - Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Exorcist: Okumura Yukio no Aishū

altTitles.en: Salaryman Exorcist: The Sorrows of Okumura Yukio

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Futsumashi Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja: サラリーマン祓魔師 奥村雪男の

description.en: A spin-off of Ao no Exorcist, following Okumura Yukio as the main protoganist.

altTitles.ja: 同居人が不安定でして

description.en: A story about the daily lives of two roommates, Fuantei-san, a slightly unstable illustrator, and Shikkari-san, a capable career woman.

altTitles.ja: 原神　電撃コミックアンソロジー

description.en:
The comic anthology of the popular Chinese game, "Genshin Impact" is already here!! Look forward to content such as… Mondstadt's new specialty, the backstory behind a certain dish, as well as various character traits never revealed before!!

---
**Cover**: Ikomochi (イコモチ)

**Author list**:
1. Sakurai Energy
2. Mikage Baku
3. Tsumumi
4. Arito Arayuru
5. Hirose Madoka
6. Kusakashi
7. Edo Hachi
8. Enda Marimo
9. Torriet
10. Kanyapyi
11. Ichi-Okunen Wakusei
12. Kanbara Erika
13. Dynamic Bacon
description.ru: Комическая антология популярной китайской игры "Genshin Impact" уже здесь!! С нетерпением ждем такого контента, как... Новое фирменное блюдо Мондштадта, предыстория определенного блюда, а также различные черты характера персонажей, которые никогда раньше не раскрывались!!
description.es-la: ¡¡El manga antología del popular juego "Genshin Impact" ya ha salido!! ¿Personajes desconocidos como Mondstadt nueva especialidad? ¡¡A un lado... te lo mostraré!!

title.en: Kokumin-teki Idol ni natta Osana-Najimi ga Boro-Apart ni Sunderu Ore no Tonari ni Hikkoshitekita Ken

altTitles.ja: 国民的アイドルになった幼馴染みが、ボロアパートに住んでる俺の隣に引っ越してきた件

altTitles.en: The Nationally Famous Idol, Who Turned Out to Be My Childhood Friend, Is Now My Neighbour!?

altTitles.es-la: Mi amiga de la infancia que se volvió una idol famosa, se mudó al lado de mi departamento

altTitles.ja-ro: Kokumin-teki Idol ni natta Osana-Najimi ga Boro-Apart ni Sunderu Ore no Tonari ni Hikkoshitekita Ken

altTitles.en: My Childhood Friend, Who Became a National Idol, Moved into My Dingy Flat Next Door.

description.en:
My childhood friend who became separated three years ago is dancing on TV as a top idol. And it was the childhood friend who moved to the next to my room to see it!?

A gem of romantic comedy that won the Comic Walker Manga Award at the 6th Kakuyomkon is now available as a comic!
description.ja:
第1巻の内容紹介: 音大に通っている俺が住んでいるボロアパート、その隣の部屋に突然引っ越してきたのは国民的アイドルにして幼馴染みの東城美月！ 3年前の約束を支えにトップまで上り詰めた彼女との奇妙なご近所生活が始まる！

Dai 1-kan no naiyō shōkai: Ondai ni tōtte iru ore ga sunde iru boroapāto, sono tonari no heya ni totsuzen hikkoshite kita no wa kokumin-teki aidoru ni shite osananajimi no Tōjō Midzuki! 3-Nen mae no yakusoku o sasae ni toppu made noboritsumeta kanojo to no kimyōna go kinjo seikatsu ga hajimaru!

description.en:
The 200,000 KM diameter artificial celestial body of APOSIMZ. Most of its volume is its core space, which is covered by a superstructural shell. Fifty centuries ago, the people who lost a war against the core lost their right to reside legitimately in APOSIMZ, and were left behind on the extremely cold surface. They face the spreading Frame disease and aggressive automatons which appear frequently on the ruins level. Yet even so, somehow people survive.  


---
description.pt:
O corpo celeste artificial de 200.000KM de diâmetro, APOSIMZ. A maior parte de seu volume se encontra no espaço de seu núcleo, que é coberto por um escudo de superestrutura. Cinquenta séculos atrás, as pessoas que perderam a guerra contra o núcleo, perderam o direito de residir legalmente em APOSIMZ e foram isoladas na superfície fria. Eles enfrentam propagação da doença dos Frames e autômatos agressivos que aparecem frequentemente no nível das ruínas. Mesmo assim, as pessoas sobrevivem.  


---

**Officially published:**  
- In english by [Kodansha](https://kodanshacomics.com/series/aposimz/) (Print version by [Vertical](http://www.vertical-comics.com/books/aposimz_01.php))  
- In french by [Glénat](https://www.glenat.com/seinen/aposimz-la-planete-des-marionnettes-tome-01-9782344028827) as "Aposimz la planète des marionnettes"  
- In italian by [Panini Comics](http://comics.panini.it/notizie/articolo/aposimz/)  
- In german by [Manga Cult](https://www.cross-cult.de/titel/aposimz-land-der-puppen-1.html) as "Aposimz - Land der Puppen"  
  
**Note:** The oneshot was also translated by Kodansha: [Link](https://kodanshacomics.com/chapter/aposimz-prologue/)
description.pt-br: O corpo celeste artificial de 200.000KM de diâmetro, APOSIMZ. A maior parte de seu volume se encontra no espaço de seu núcleo, que é coberto por um escudo de superestrutura. Cinquenta séculos atrás, as pessoas que perderam a guerra contra o núcleo, perderam o direito de residir legalmente em APOSIMZ e foram isoladas na superfície fria. Eles enfrentam propagação da doença dos Frames e autômatos agressivos que aparecem frequentemente no nível das ruínas. Mesmo assim, as pessoas sobrevivem…

description.en:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, her soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
description.fr:
Yuuji est un jeune étudiant qui excelle dans le sport, notamment dans l'athlétisme, mais qui a un immense poil dans la main. Du coup, au lieu de parfaire ses capacités physiques qui pourraient lui permettre de devenir le meilleur de l'établissement, il s'est inscrit au club de recherches occultes du lycée. Son petit train-train va changer du tout au tout lorsqu'un véritable esprit malfaiteur vient menacer son école…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Юдзи гений на поле! Вот только школьная активность его мало чем привлекает. Став частью клуба оккультных исследований он решает зажить тихой жизнью, но все меняется, когда в школе объявляются духи.
description.tr: Yuuji bir atletizm dehasıdır ama koşuya hiç ilgisi yoktur. Bilinmezleri Araştırma Kulübünde çok mutludur. Her ne kadar kulüpte eğlencesine bulunsa bile, okulda gerçek bir ruh ortaya çıkınca işler ciddiye biner! Hayat, Sugisawa Şehrindeki 3 Numaralı Lisedeki çocuklar için tuhaflaşmaya başlamak üzere!
description.uk: Ітадорі Юуджі - надзвичайно талановитий старшокласник із Сендаю. Утім, хоч він і вправний спортсмен, його не цікавлять спортивні клуби: він піклується про свого дідуся, що лежить у місцевій лікарні. Все змінюється, коли через жартівливий спіритичний сеанс на Юуджі та його друзів раптово нападають моторошні чудовиська, яких дивакуватий незнайомець, Фушіґуро Меґумі, чомусь називає прокляттями. Аби врятувати себе та друзів, Юуджі змушений ризикнути - і так випадково стати вмістилищем легендарного, наймогутнішого короля проклять. А потім на тобі - вирок: "тебе мають стратити". Ну і що робити? Тяжкий вибір, магічна школа, нові друзі й нові проблеми - так починається його шлях...
description.pt-br: Itadori Yuuji, um estudante do colegial com uma capacidade física única, tem como rotina visitar seu avô que está hospitalizado. Porém, um dia, o selo de um "objeto amaldiçoado" escondido em sua escola é rompido, fazendo surgir criaturas assustadoras. Para salvar seus colegas ele parte em direção ao colégio, quando algo inesperado acontece...!

altTitles.ja: はらぺこサキュバスはいかせたいのに！

altTitles.en: The Hungry Succubus Wants to Make Him Cum, But...!
The Hungry Succubus Wants to Consume Him

altTitles.es-la: La succubus hambrienta quiere hacerlo eyacular, ¡Pero...!

description.en:
Kururi-chan The Succubus is an unprecedented super elite!! She's been in a rut lately because her luscious body is too powerful and she can easily be promiscuous. Kururi then discovers Jien, a young virgin monk in training. 

Lucky☆Happy☆Strongest Kururi-chan is going to charge in with great pleasure!! The greedy and confident Succubus and the serious monk clash in this happy love comedy!♡
description.ja: サキュバスのくるりちゃんは空前絶後の超絶スーパーエリート！！わがままボディが最強すぎて簡単に催淫できちゃうから、最近マンネリ気味なのだ。そんなくるりが発見したのは修行中の若き童貞僧・慈円。ラッキー☆ハッピー☆最強くるりちゃん、大歓喜で突撃しちゃいまーす！！強欲自信家サキュバスちゃん×真面目な修行僧くんの激突ハッピーラブコメディ♡
description.es-la: ¡Succubus Kururi-chan es una súper élite sin precedentes! ! Mi cuerpo egoísta es demasiado fuerte y puedo volverme afrodisíaco fácilmente, así que he estado en una rutina recientemente. Tal Kururi descubre a un joven monje virgen, Jien, que está entrenando. ¡Afortunado☆Feliz☆Kururi-chan, el más fuerte, cargará con gran alegría! ! Una comedia romántica feliz entre una súcubo codiciosa y segura de sí misma y un monje en prácticas serio ♡

description.en: The high school boy Onitake Daio is a gentle giant cursed to suffer pain when he comes into contact with the opposite sex. One day, a junior girl Minase Kaio came up to him and unexpectedly asked, "Will you please be my pet"!?
description.ja: 強面だけど根は優しい高校生・鬼武大王は、異性と接触するとなぜか苦しくなるという悩みがあった。ある日、鬼武の前に水無瀬紅葉と名乗る後輩が現れ、「ペットになってください」という予想外の告白を受けて——!?
description.es-la: ¡¿"Mascota o sirviente"?! Una excéntrica masoquista erótica ♪ Daiki Onitake , un estudiante de secundaria que es fuerte pero gentil, tenia un problema, de alguna manera al entrar en contacto con el sexo opuesto sufría grandes dolores. un día, una Kouhai llamada Iroha Minase aparece frente a él para hacerle una confesión inesperada, "Por favor se mi mascota".

altTitles.th: นางร้ายหุ่นเชิด

altTitles.vi: Kẻ Phản diện chỉ là Một Con Rối

description.en:
"Beauty cannot be real power."

Cayena, the Imperial Princess, was known as the most beautiful woman in the Empire. She was a woman who knew nothing but evil and luxury. However, she was destined for ruin: she would be used as a chess piece by her younger brother to secure his throne and killed by her crazy husband.

"I'll make you the emperor."

"…Sister, you're going to make me the emperor?"

"In exchange, give me freedom."

She had to change things before she became *that* Cayena.

---
I woke up as Kayena Hill, the novel’s villainess, praised as the greatest beauty in the empire. Who knew that her story would catch my attention because I was her in my past life? Destined for terrible ends, I’ve died twice—but I refuse to die a third time as a pawn in someone else’s scheme. I’m no longer the vain and naïve princess. Now that I know how the story will unfold, I’ll turn the tables around and have everyone dancing to my tune. This time, I’ll be the one pulling the strings.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%A6%AC%EC%98%A4%EB%84%A4%ED%8A%B8/2464), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56422254)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/17106), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-villainess-is-a-marionette/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E6%98%AF%E6%87%B8%E7%B5%B2%E6%9C%A8%E5%81%B6/94)
* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/231)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Villainess-is-a-Marionette/40)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/67171)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%B8%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%94/117)
description.ru:
Принцесса Каена, прославившаяся своей красотой на всю Империю, не ведает ничего, кроме алчности и злобы. Долгое время она пыталась избавиться от своего младшего брата-тирана, но встретила смерть от руки своего мужа.
— Я помогу тебе стать Императором.
— Сестра… Вы обо мне?..
— Но в обмен… ты подаришь мне свободу.
До того, как «я» стану принцессой Каеной.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%A6%AC%EC%98%A4%EB%84%A4%ED%8A%B8/2464), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56422254)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/17106), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-villainess-is-a-marionette/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E6%98%AF%E6%87%B8%E7%B5%B2%E6%9C%A8%E5%81%B6/94)
* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/231)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Villainess-is-a-Marionette/40)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/67171)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%B8%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%94/117)
description.zh:
帝国的皇女，卡也娜，被誉为帝国最漂亮的女人。 她也是一个除了邪恶与奢侈以外一无所知的女人。 但是，她注定会灭亡：她的弟弟用她作为棋子来保住自己的王位，而最终卡也娜也会被自己疯狂的丈夫杀死。 “我会让你成为皇帝。” “……姐姐，您是指我吗？” “作为交换，请给我自由。” 她必须在成为那个卡也娜之前扭转局面。

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%A6%AC%EC%98%A4%EB%84%A4%ED%8A%B8/2464), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56422254)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/17106), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-villainess-is-a-marionette/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E6%98%AF%E6%87%B8%E7%B5%B2%E6%9C%A8%E5%81%B6/94)

* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%B8%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%94/117)

altTitles.ja: 女魔王様はゆうしゃくんを倒せない。

altTitles.en: The Demon Queen Can't Defeat Yuusha-kun.

description.en:
Demon Queen Abyss is worried… She's not able to defeat the Hero, considered the mortal enemy of the demons. This Hero is still an inexperienced young man—he should be easy to defeat! … However, the problem is that he, not knowing Abyss's true identity, considers her his “Master” and has become very fond of her…!?
___
Produced with the help of and supervised by [studioHEADLINE](https://mangadex.org/author/657c3108-5817-4669-a957-a9c7ec5080ee/studio-headline).
description.pt-br: A Rainha Demônio Abyss está preocupada... ela não é capaz de derrotar o herói, considerado o inimigo mortal dos demônio. Esse herói ainda é um jovem inexperiente — ele deveria ser fácil de derrotar! ... Todavia, o problema é que ele, não conhecendo a verdadeira identidade de Abyss, a considera sua "Mestra" e gosta muito dela...!?

description.en: Fight poison with poison! Risa Aioi is a detective with a most unusual prediliction. Her investigative techniques verge on the criminal, pushing viscious criminals to turn themselves in! Ultra irregular! A unique take on the crime-suspense genre!
description.ru: Популярная женщина-знаменитость убита! Расследование приводит к подозрительной женщине, следующей целью которой может стать знаменитый актер Тагаме. Каковы могут быть мотивы подозреваемого? Детективы-близнецы идут по следу подозреваемого, но потом... Уникальный взгляд на жанр криминального саспенса!
description.es-la: Sakon Futatsuki es la última incorporación a la Unidad de Investigación Criminal de la Policía Metropolitana de Tokio. Junto a su hermano mayor, Ukon, investiga una plétora de crímenes mientras trata de defender sus propios principios y moral. Por el contrario, Risa Aioi es una detective hábil que trabaja en la misma división, pero utiliza medios no convencionales para encontrar y capturar criminales. Tiene la tendencia a enamorarse locamente del perpetrador objetivo y recurrirá a acecharlos sin descanso hasta que se entreguen. Sakon está horrorizado por el método extremadamente cuestionable de Aioi para cazar criminales, a pesar de que tiene una alta tasa de éxito. Él está decidido a hacer que ella reconsidere su enfoque en la lucha contra el crimen, pero cuanto más aprende sobre su pasado, más reacio es a hacerlo. Al mismo tiempo, Aioi se encuentra queriendo controlar sus impulsos porque todavía hay un criminal al que desea capturar por encima de todo. Preocupado por la seguridad de su colega, Sakon debe aprender a luchar contra el "veneno con veneno" y controlarlo antes de que sea demasiado tarde.
description.pt-br: Uma celebridade popular é uma assassinada! A investigação leva à suspeita de uma mulher cujo seu alvo possa ser o famoso ator Tagame. Qual poderia ser o motivo? Uma dupla de detetives está atrás da suspeita, mas então... Uma visão única do gênero crime-suspense.

title.en: Sherbet Above the Sea of Fog

description.en:
Sherbet, a girl from a noble family, is forced to marry a man she has never met. She decides to escape this fate and joins a cruise that sails through the sea of mist, a place full of legends and secrets.

There, she meets several interesting characters, such as a pirate captain, a runaway princess, a curious mermaid and a cruel empress. She also discovers that the cruise is actually a ghost ship that takes the souls of the dead to the next world.

She will have to face various dangers and challenges to escape the ship and find her true love.

title.en: Asumi-chan is Interested in Lesbian Brothels!

altTitles.ja-ro: Asumi-chan wa Les Fuuzoku ni Kyoumi ga Arimasu!

altTitles.ja: 彩純ちゃんはレズ風俗に興味があります！

altTitles.zh: 彩纯对蕾丝风俗大有兴趣！

altTitles.zh-ro: Cǎichún duì lěisī fēngsú dà yǒu xìngqù!

altTitles.zh-hk: 彩純對蕾絲風俗大有興趣！

altTitles.es-la: ¡Asumi-chan está interesada en burdeles de lesbianas!

description.en: Sweet but awkward college student Asumi never got over her childhood crush on her old friend Mai. Their first and only kiss couldn’t have gone worse. So when she learns that Mai may be working at a nearby brothel, she sets her sights on redemption! But there’s one catch: none of the women on the brothel’s website use full photos or real names. Thus begins a journey of self-discovery and sexual exploration as she sets out to find her one that got away.
description.es-la: Una chica llamada Asumi cumple 20 años y su amiga decide llevarla a un burdel lésbico para que esta encuentre a su amiga de la infancia...¿podrá Asumi encontrarla sin caer en la tentación?

description.en: A half-Swedish, half-Japanese girl who seems to have everything except experience with men is using a date coaching app to get used to flirting. However the guy she hits it off with actually uses the same app with a different coach!
description.id:
Renai Daikou (Love Agency) – Agen Cinta
Akasaka Aka x Nishizawa 5mm
Akasaka Aka, yang telah membuat sejarah dalam sejarah komedi romantis dengan “Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen”, kembali dengan komedi romantis baru! Tim baru ini bekerja sama dengan Nishizawa 5mm, seorang pendatang baru yang sedang menjadi topik hangat di dunia manga online! Ini adalah awal dari “komedi
description.ru:
Девушка со шведскими и японскими корнями, у которой, кажется, есть всё, кроме опыта общения противоположным полом, использует приложение для обучения свиданиям, чтобы научиться флиртовать.
Однако парень, с которым у нее завязываются отношения, использует то же приложение с другим тренером!
description.uk:
Ака Акасака, автор "Каґуя-сама хоче, щоб він зізнався їй. Війна сердець та розумів геніїв" та "Дитя улюбленця", презентує свій новий витвір!

У Марі Марії Вінтер-Нанасе, наполовину шведки, наполовину японки, є все, про що можна мріяти. Дівчина виросла в заможній родині закордоном, має багато подруг і вродливу зовнішність. Однак є в ній один недолік: вона не вміє розмовляти з хлопцями!

Узявши в бібліотеці книгу про кохання, у ній вона знайшла підозрілу рекламу. Там йшлося про Агентство Кохання, що надає профі в коханні, який упорається з вашим особистим життям за вас. Після того, як дівчина відсканувала код, з'являється агентка, на ім'я Кон, та обіцяє допомогти Марі зійтися з її коханим. Однак хлопець, що припав їй до душі, Секі Масая, не такий уже й невинний і також користується послугами агентства, щоб почати зустрічатися з нею. Як складеться доля цієї пари?
description.vi: Tác phẩm của Akasaka Aka (tác giả của Oshi no Ko và Kaguya-sama) và Nishizawa 5mm. Một cô gái mang trong mình dòng máu Thụy Điển và Nhật Bản cực kỳ ưu tú nhưng cô ấy lại không có kinh nghiệm với đàn ông. Cô ấy quyết định sử dụng một ứng dụng dịch vụ tình yêu để chinh phục chàng trai ấy. Tuy nhiên, anh chàng mà cô ấy nhắm đến cũng đang sử dụng ứng dụng đó để chinh phục cô!
description.pt-br: Uma garota meio sueca/meio japonesa que parece ter tudo, exceto experiência com homens, está usando um aplicativo de coaching para encontros para se acostumar a flertar. No entanto, o cara com quem ela se dá bem na verdade usa o mesmo aplicativo com um treinador diferente!

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

title.en: Osananajimi to wa Romcom ni Naranai

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染とはラブコメにならない

altTitles.ja-ro: Osananajimi to wa Love Comedy ni Naranai

altTitles.th: ไม่มีทางที่มันจะกลายเป็นเลิฟคอมเมดี้กับยัยเพื่อนสมัยเด็กหรอก

altTitles.zh-hk: 和青梅竹馬之間不會有戀愛喜劇

altTitles.ar: لا مزيد من الحب مع الفتيات.

altTitles.vi: Làm Gì Có Chuyện Tình Hài Hước Giữa Bạn Thuở Nhỏ Được!

altTitles.en: It Won't Become A Romcom With Childhood Friends
No more love with the girls.

description.en: The high school boy Eiyuu has a problem! His two childhood friends (♀) who go to the same school as him, Shio and Akari, are too cute! Even though they have no interest in him, he looks at their grown-up selves with sexual interest. If they were to find out… it would be utterly embarrassing! Meanwhile, his two childhood friends also have secrets of their own...!? It's irritating! It's complicated!! But childhood friends are the best!!! A sweet and irritating love triangle romcom ♡ where you can't be honest!
description.ja: 高校生男子・えーゆーの悩み。それは、二人の幼馴染「しお」と「あかり」が可愛すぎること! 向こうにその気はないのに、俺だけがオトナになった二人をエッチな目で見てるなんてバレたら…ハズすぎる! 一方、実は二人もえーゆーのことが…!? ヒロイン全員、幼馴染!! じれったい! ややこしい!! けど幼馴染って超最高っ!!!
description.th: เอยู (A.U.) หนุ่มมอปลายที่กำลังพบปัญหาใหญ่! ปัญหานั่นก็คือเพื่อนสมัยเด็กทั้งสองคน "ชิโอ" และ "อาการิ" ที่อยู่โรงเรียนเดียวกันนั้นน่ารักเกินต้าน! ถ้าหากทั้งสองรู้ว่าเขาได้มองพวกเธอที่เติบโตขึ้นมาอย่างสมส่วนด้วยสายตาลามก (ถึงแม้จะไม่ได้ตั้งใจ) ล่ะก็มีหวังแย่แน่! ในทางกลับกัน เพื่อนสมัยเด็กทั้งสองคนนั้นเองก็มีความลับของตนเอง...!? ทั้งหยอกเย้า! ทั้งทำให้สับสน!! ถึงจะอย่างนั้นเพื่อนสมัยเด็กนี่แหละยอดที่สุด!!! เลิฟคอมเมดี้รักสามเส้าแสนหวานที่พูดตรง ๆ ไม่ได้♡

title.en: Genkai OL to Joshi Daisei ga 〇〇 Suru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 限界OLと女子大生が〇〇する話

altTitles.en: An OL at Her Limit and a College Girl

description.en: Segawa-san is the star of the office who everyone depends on. But she's stretched thin, and the state of her apartment has gotten dire. After a fateful encounter, the college student next door offers to lend a helping hand!
description.ja: 仕事ができて皆から頼られる完璧OL 瀬川さん。しかし家では、汚部屋で毎日コンビニ飯を食べる限界生活を送っていた。ある日、お隣に住む片付け上手でしっかり者の女子大生 安藤さんに部屋の片付けを手伝ってもらうことになり…？

description.en:
Indolent beauty x loyal yandere dog x requited love redeemer 
An Ziqing, who has always been a bohemian, wanders among the flowers, not touching a single leaf. He is longing for a crazy and unique love to fill his empty heart. One day, according to rumors, Yu Zhen, the son of a famous painter, visits him and invites him to be a model for his new work. This young man with a gloomy and timid appearance falls in love with him at first sight, and the paranoia hidden under the appearance of a loyal dog slowly emerges...

title.en: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.ja: 追放されるたびにスキルを手に入れた俺が、100の異世界で2周目無双

altTitles.en: I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched
Unmatched in 100 Different Worlds — I Gain a New Skill Every Time I Get Banished

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...
- - -
Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.

Only this time he is accompanied to these 100 worlds by a former companion…
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...
